body_html:
Happy new year!
The issue is potentially a side effect of us moving our build machines up to ubuntu 16.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.5/RELEASE.md

We made this decision because cuda 9 docker images using ubuntu 14 were not available, and we elected to keep all builds on the same base system image.

@jhseu @martinwicke FYI

body:
Happy new year!
The issue is potentially a side effect of us moving our build machines up to ubuntu 16.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.5/RELEASE.md

We made this decision because cuda 9 docker images using ubuntu 14 were not available, and we elected to keep all builds on the same base system image.

@jhseu @martinwicke FYI
